website_summaries.verdict: This gorgeous handcrafted jewelry box will easily accommodate even the most extensive jewelry collection.
pros: Top quality construction that's sturdy, practical, and visually appealing
Extra large capacity with a compartment for every piece, and a convenient fold-out panel for hanging necklaces and bracelets
Sleek, modern design compliments any decor
cons: Has a larger footprint than most, and if you're short on space this may not be the best option

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, holds a lot of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for quite awhile to find an appropriate jewelry box that would hold everything I owned: mostly earrings, necklaces, bracelets (both small delicate ones and big bangles). I don't own many rings besides my wedding ring. I also own a lot of jewelry, and I was pleasantly surprised with how much this box could hold and organize. The quality looks decent, although I doubt its real leather. The bottom taller drawer is great for big chunky bracelets. The other drawers with dividers are perfect for my many earrings. I liked that this seller shows you the inside of all the drawers, which other jewelry boxes for sale on Amazon did not do.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Ring holder is broken/ unglued in
customer_reviews.text: Box looks nice, has many compartments however top must not have been checked because the ring holder part is completely not glued in. Looks really bad and can't hold rings in it
customer_reviews.author: Ty Matik

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value, Beautiful Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific place for my jewelry. I have been using pouches and smaller things to hold my items. This is perfect. It's rather large, but that's just what I wanted was. That means I can always buy things and fill it up! I'm very happy with the quality of this jewelry box. You can purchase a lock for the top section. The sides open up and allow for quite a few chains and necklaces as well. Lots of room, and a very solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S-C Florida

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful. I bought the light colored one and it is very pretty. Plenty of room in the multiple drawers and you can put several necklaces on the hooks in side storage areas. There are eight hooks on each side with fabric pocket below for longer chains to rest in. Four of the drawers have different sized compartments to keep items separate and the fifth drawer is just a drawer with no dividers. All five drawers can pull all the way out so you can easily sort or find things in the back. It seems very sturdy and I think will last me for many, many years. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CHF

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the reviews but there weren't a whole lot of other options. I fully inspected it when it arrived, expecting the worst. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it was put assembled well, looked clean and classy, and did not smell funny or have any loose parts or threads. Overall, my wife was very happy with it and I was too.
customer_reviews.author: Unavailable

customer_reviews.title: Bought for living in a fifth wheel.
customer_reviews.text: We are moving into a fifth wheel and I had a ton of jewelry so I bought two of these. I use the light colored one for silver and the dark brown one for gold. Lots of storage and seems well constructed. I wish there was a way to secure the drawers closed but I will figure something out. Can't wait to try them out on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Although they call it a "Huge Leather Jewelry Box, ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they call it a "Huge Leather Jewelry Box," this box is NOT made of leather. It is made of something called PU leather. Completely artificial. PU is right. This deceptive advertising stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful large jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this box, now for those who are saying this isn't real leather... it isn't, and it does say AP leather which is synthetic. Anyway it's speak and soft, plenty of room to organize. I've been using two small jewelry boxes and needed to be able to hang necklaces and actually be able to find my earrings. Great sturdy buy ☺ came well package.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice large size and quality, I spent a week researching all different options and very happy with my choice. Top section fits about 10-12 rings + space for bracelets and miscellaneous items. Second and third drawers are also perfect for rings and smaller items. If you are like me and have tons of smaller jewelry and want every item to have it's own space, this will be great option.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Years of accumulation into one box, finally
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box exceeded my expectations. I had years worth of jewelry tucked in separate jewel boxes all over the place and now I'm finally able to combine everything into this generous well organized treasure chest, it had room for everything! It's beautiful, well made and top quality workmanship. Plus it has closures and handle on top for easy storage and mobility. Best investment I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jandor

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Box was a Christmas gift to my wife.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Jewelry Box to my wife for Christmas. She likes if very much. It is easy to organize necklaces so they don't get tangled. It is spacious with plenty of room for rings and jewelry that is worn often to access on the top. The drawers have separate slots for her earrings so they are easy to access. Some drawers have bigger slots for bracelets and miscellaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: biggreenserpent

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Style
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this jewel box. It’s really well designed and finished with a nice deep drawer at the bottom for big bracelets or chunkier jewelry. The two side panels open to reveal a double hanging space for necklaces with small covered hooks at the top. It has a pocket at the bottom to hold the necklace in place. One drawer has really small divisions, probably good for studs, another has slightly larger square divisions. One has no divisions and another has divisions from front to back, maybe for bigger earnings or longer slim bracelets. It would be perfect for a really special present and I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger jewelry box and this is perfect. I can fit everything I have, and there's room for more. I like that the drawers had a variety of 'cubby' sizes, perfect for small earrings, large earrings, watches, bracelets and chunky necklaces. There really is a lot of space. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marble

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a genuine leather
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a genuine leather. It says Leather in the description but it is deceiving as if you read carefully, it says "Leather Finish". You can expect genuine leather for that price. Very disappointed. It goes back to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JB&AB

customer_reviews.title: Love the layout.  Nice look.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying my new jewelry chest. It fit all of the jewelry I had to put in it, and left me a drawer for some papers I like to keep handy. It fits nicely on my dresser, and it's easy to hide away if we have workers in the house. The only thing I would change in design, would be a way to keep the drawers shut if it becomes unlevel when putting it away. Also, it should be noted that this is much too large for most people to use for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather Jewelry Case!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a large leather jewelry case. On my dresser I had 3 different cases for my jewelry. One was leather but was too small to hold everything,but I really liked the look of a leather case. I saw the Kendall huge jewelry case. What I really liked on Amazon was the pictures showed what each drawer and side panels would hold. I have to say the workmanship is beautiful and I was able to organize my jewelry in the case perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a nice jewelley box for years and then came across this. The design is lovely, simple and classy. Quality and craftmanship is A+ and the design layout of each draw is perfect for me. Can't say enough good things about this product. I also love that it comes with a note from the customer service team asking that you call or email them in the first instance if there are problems, so that they have an opportunity to make things right first. I really appreciate customer service detail like that. I don't think I'll need to call though. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Jewelry box to rule them all!
customer_reviews.text: My big sis got this from me for Christmas. It looks amazing with enough storage, drawers and compartments for all her jewelry. It is definitely not for Travelling as it is quite large and mainly should be kept in your house. Overall a good buy and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: OmegaDan

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife. She was using a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She was using a box before so now she loves this. Everything she has fits in here perfectly. However if she gets more jewelry, which she will, she is gonna have to get a bigger box. However this does the Job for your average collector.
customer_reviews.author: Benny watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very functional
customer_reviews.text: This Jewelry box is very good quality and looks beautiful. It has two compartments for hanging necklaces (both sides) which are easy to access and keep chains from tangling. There is plenty of space for rings and studs and each drawer is divided into different sizes providing the perfect fit for different kinds of jewelry. It locks only the upper compartment, but it was not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Very well made. I recently downsized from a wooden floor model jewelry box to this one... The white one, and I am well pleased. I can fit so much in it, and that says a lot, since I have a lot of jewelry, even after downsizing. I can't say enough positive here to do it justice. The shipment was also very fast, well packaged and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of items and lets you easily find which ones you want
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-constructed jewelry box. Top drawer could be locked with a small lock. Unfortunately, the lower 5 drawers slide easily when the box is tipped. I have had the drawers slip/spill out when I move the box. Would be nice if there was some way to prevent the lower drawers from sliding out so easily. Each drawer is nicely set up and I like the small compartments in the one drawer for smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B.

customer_reviews.title: You will have more cuff links and Tie Clasps than you ever thought.
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't Think a Man would want a Jewelry Box, But i was buying one or so for my wife an decided to organize some old things of my own. When i saw this Leather one so I thought It Was Manley-Man enough. Low and behold I organized stuff from High School. All kind of stuff that was Around. I like it so much I Got another one. It Nice looking Well made Strong And full of things that were once scattered about in drawers etc. You find things you didn't remember you had and it even has a handle in order to move it easily.
customer_reviews.author: mike m

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this and finally have my jewelry well organised. It's not real leather but I wasn't expecting it to be so at this price. Some reviews said it smells terrible but I don't think so - definitely smells synthetic out of the box but two days later I don't notice anything. It looks great on my dresser and saves space as it's tall. I was a bit nervous spending this much money without fully examining it first but I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Unprovable

customer_reviews.title: Large and well made
customer_reviews.text: The jewelry box arrived with some scuff marks on the bottom edge, but I was able to remove them with a damp cloth. The box is well made overall, better than I expected, and holds a good amount of jewelry. I especially like the divided drawers for holding and separating of small items. I would recommend the box. It would make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tosca

customer_reviews.title: plenty of storage room
customer_reviews.text: I like this jewelry box. Plenty of room for earrings, necklaces, rings bracelets. There are small divided cubes for earrings or if you prefer rings. Side doors open for hanging necklaces or earrings that tend to tangle, There is a space for rings and there are drawers that has no dividers in them for if you want to put boxes in your jewelry box. I don't know about using the jewelry box for traveling it is a good size box and unless you are planning on being on a trip for a month or more I myself would not need to take all of my jewelry with me on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is a gift to my daughter. So well packaged , that all I did was take it out n looked at it with wrap still on it. Then put it right back in package. I’m honestly not one that does this. Usually I’m all over it. But with kind of care they took with packing this, I what her to see that. Makes me think they take care n pride in what they do. After Christmas I’ll try to remember to come back and give update on how it’s held up. But so far looks great n I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Deel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, I received half an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, I received half an hour ago. I opened it and although it was very well packed, one of the drawers corner is damaged, I'm not sure if I will keep it...
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Rastegar

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Can find/see my jewelry & separate pins, Earrings, necklaces, etc. I bought 2, one for gold & one for silver. The separate drawers are designed for the different types of jewelry & different sizes. I can also move all my jewelry to a safe or other location when I go out of town. However the case would be bulky or heavy for traveling on a plane. But easy to find the jewelry you want to pack quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. It's well made, beautiful inside and out. And the top area where you put your rings etc. that come out so you can just move it to the safe for when you are out of town. It holds a lot, and each drawer is unique. I would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaWr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive looking. The drawers are perfect - lots of different sizes. Closes down into a nice neat box. Wish there wasn't a handle on top but the good far outweighs the handle problem. Not a lot of room for long necklaces, so unless you want to coil them in the bottom drawers, you may need something else to hang them. Perfect for earrings both on top and in the little compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but not well built
customer_reviews.text: It is a functional and spacious home for my jewelry, but the slightest tilt forward and the drawers fall open. Tilt it a bit more and they fall out. It could also have more of the folded material for rings. I actually took the material out of my last jewelry box and added it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Would make a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I just got this case yesterday and I’m already thrilled! The quality is great, well built and sturdy. It’s also more spacious than I was expecting. It holds all of my jewelry plus room to add more pieces. This would make an excellent gift for someone. In this case, it was a nice gift to myself!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Organize all your jewelry and still be able to SEE it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry box! All my earrings, rings, necklaces and watches are neatly stored and not scattered all over my dresser. I can easily find everything and accessorize as I’m rushing to get ready for work in the morning. I thought it would look big and bulky on my dresser, but I have it sitting in the corner out of the way. I am so happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: DeKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Box at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my aunt who lost everything last year in the terrible Santa Rosa fires. She really needed something substantial to put all her new jewelry in having to start over. Her caretaker liked it so much I ordered a second one for her a week later. The ladies seem to love all the features and drawers. It should keep them busy for hours. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Woods Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing my jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I had so many boxes and jewelry containers with various jewelry items that I had a hard time locating what I wanted to wear, when I wanted it. This storage case solved the problem. I can find everything I need now right away because I put it in a place I can always find - one of the cubbies in the storage box! Very happy with the quality of the item. Perfect for my needs. I don't see traveling with it because it's pretty big, plus all my items would get jumbled up inside with a lot of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just a nice sized square leather box is all I needed and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! I didn't want any wood ornate mess of a box sitting on my dresser; I already own the furniture style jewelry box that sits on the floor in my closet, this is for the pieces I wear more frequently, just a nice sized square leather box is all I needed and this fits the bill perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is very cute. I got the white with pink interior. It holds a lot of items. I was excited to get it, went through my mounds of earrings, bracelets, necklaces, cleaned them and organized into this box. It seems well made, not cheapish looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this item to pack up her jewelry for college. This is a great roomy jewelry box. It allowed her to bring all the items she loves and nothing gets lost or tangled. The outer portion is a soft sort of leather and easy to wipe clean with a nice solid toggle on the outside to keep it closed. She loves it and it goes great with her room decor too!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife LOVES IT. It looks beautiful and she got rid of her old (smaller) one. I was so inspired I got the one for men's watches and LOVE IT TOO.. Well Made and I got no smell as a couple of older reviews posted, I'm happy and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nitram

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jewelry box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jewelry box. Much better than I had expected. The white is perfect and goes with the light color bedroom set I have. It's got ample room to fit my needs with different sized compartments to accommodate and organize various size jewelry. When it is in the closed position, it sits and looks very elegant on my bureau. Great find, nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buffer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-designed, very nice leather case
customer_reviews.text: This has held up extremely well over the past few years and I still have room for an ever-growing jewelry collection. Very nice leather and well-designed compartments and drawers hold a wide variety of jewelry-- from small, delicate pieces to larger costume pieces.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It's better in person than in the picture. I highly recommend this jewelry box for all your needs. I have a ton of jewelry and I placed all of it in the box and there is still room for more. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

customer_reviews.title: drawer pulls are not very secure
customer_reviews.text: the box size and configuration were just what I was looking for- however, quality of construction leaves some to be desired- the pulls on the drawers are not very sturdy- I already had one come off- had to use some gorilla glue to get it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kolosky

customer_reviews.title: Luxury item - affordable pricing
customer_reviews.text: The Kendal Leather Jewelry Box is truly exquisite! Sleek styling with attention to detail, beautiful leather finish with suede interior. The brass clasps, along with trim/stitching, add to the customized look. Ample storage for all of my important pieces. These days, it seems that many manufacturers skimp on quality and detail - that is certainly not the case with this product! It is truly a WIN for the customer when you can score a luxury product, at a very fair price! I would highly recommend this jewelry box to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Large and I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I need a jewelry case that would hold all my items. I love that this product was able to do that for me. There are drawers with different sized slots, side doors to hang items, etc. Highly recommend for someone with lots of different items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box. Great quality, packaged perfectly and right now my jewelry is nestled like a bug in a rug. I highly recommend this. I have it on a high dresser and the drawers pull out nicely so I can select what I want and put it back in. It’s not real leather, but is constructed so well, looks so beautiful you won’t mind. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move to a secure location
customer_reviews.text: I gave this jewelry case a 5 because it fits my purposes. I want something I could easily move and secure when we have peaple working in the house. It holds all og my fine jewelry as well as sentimental pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drawers are not secure for travel.
customer_reviews.text: well made and attractive - but not suitable as a travel case because their is nothing to secure the drawers. They slide out very easy when case is picked up. As a stationary case it doesn't work for me - the divider sections are so small it's difficult for me to get earrings out and French wires get stuck. My necklaces are all longer than the hanging area - and when pendant is tucked in the cute velvet pouch I have no idea which chain is what. This may be perfect for others - just not me. I am donating it to a charity yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Jewelery Box
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on the date I expected and it was a great gift for my wife. The unit holds all of her jewellery pieces and she was very impressed with the layout and the amount of space. The box is well made and the feel of the leather is nice. The gold color accented snaps and pulls give it a special feel. Over all we were very pleased with our purchase of this jewelry box. Happy wife Happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Really I was looking for something to hold my necklaces ...
customer_reviews.text: Really I was looking for something to hold my necklaces, which it does. Less effective for heavier/thicker necklaces and the compartment separators do not move at all which is why 4 not 5 stars. I am not sure what the large drawer is for or why you would need it but otherwise this product seems well worth the money. A lot of different size compartments for your jewelry. Was worried on reading the reviews about a possible odor as many mentioned this but I did not have that problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item, perfect item to store valuables.
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is lovely. Very well made and so attractive. Good for men or women. Lots of space and many sizes of places for a variety. Small ones for earrings or cufflinks. Medium ones for larger earrings, bracelets or anything you like. long ones for a wristwatch ⌚ or bracelet. Several little hooks on both sides for necklaces and pockets for them to rest in while hanging so no chance of tangling or falling. Just an all-around tasteful box with a handle on the top and a mirror so one can admire their items.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and is very spacious
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a LONG time before settling on this one which seemed a good compromise on side and prize compared to the bigger armoires. Glad I did as it looks amazing and is super spacious - very much recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sabine F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewel box. It is very sturdy and fits a lot more items than expected! We sold our home to go full time RVing and I had tons of jewelry that I had to sell. Thankfully I purchased this wonderful box and didnt have to get rid of my favorite pieces. Love, love, love this box!
customer_reviews.author: Debr1127

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jewelry Tote/Case
customer_reviews.text: Was toting jewelry from one house to the next; this was the perfect solution. I can carry it back and forth with so many drawers, slots ad areas for various jewelry. It is quite heavy but such good quality, I don’t mind. Do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is large enough to hold all my jewelry and helped me move away from plastic bags for separating/organizing jewelry. I love the little open space by the rings in the top, because I put all of my most-worn pieces in there and just retrieve them every morning. The bottom drawer is deep enough to store my smartwatch and its charger when I don't feel like wearing it for a while, and it's the right size and shape for storing necklaces that retain a circular shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Alas, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this box. When I first got it, I thought it was beautiful and really sturdy. It was able to fit all of my jewelry, surprisingly. But after several days, probably about 3 to 4, the top of the box lifted it up at the seem. I don’t understand why, I hadn’t moved the box nor did anything brush up against it. I wanted to return it, but alas I’m lazy and did not want to remove all of my jewelry and go through trying to find another jewelry box or have them replace it. *Sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is compact and attractive enough to display on your dresser, and well organized to hold a lot of jewelry. Each drawer has a different set of compartments, one for earrings, one for pins, one for rings and one for bracelets. Necklaces hang on hooks on both sides of the box. It is heavy, but I don’t plan to move it. I’m so happy with it that I bought one for my daughter and she’s happy with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful jewelry case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jewelry case in white to sit on top of my dresser. It's just perfect! Holds a lot of my pieces and I find it's a great way to organize my jewelry so I actually wear it more often. I would highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter. It's very well constructed and holds a large amount of jewelry. (everything she had) I gave it four stars for travel, because it is a heavy piece. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: skinch

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of storage and well designed. Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the design of this box. Plenty of space to store your jewelry. I was specifically looking for a spot for large clunky bracelets. The bottom drawer is perfect. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GizmoFreak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: While this is probably more than I would normally spend, this case has all the features one would ask, for its size. It is beautifully laid out and has more than adequate spaces for the jewelry I have. I have both silver and gold and this should accommodate both nicely. It is also lockable and portable, nice features. I have not totally loaded it, but I believe it will make my jewelry much more accessible and easy to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Handle was broken immediately. Very cheap construction. It's cardboard with fake leather glued to it. That would've been fine had the handle not broken so easily. I didn't even have anything in it. A decent amount of storage space for a small to medium jewelry collection.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Kendal Huge Leather Jewelry Box/case
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well organized jewelry box. I love it and will give it to my granddaughter for her birthday. The color is beautiful. Thanks so much, Cindy Benoit
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: While I wasn’t expecting this to be completely amazing the quality has left a lot to be desired. I bought this last Christmas for my girlfriend who is careful with her belongings, but this jewelry box already looks beat. It has a good assortment of compartments but is severely lacking in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Alba

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box. It is very well built, it's very pretty, it's efficient for jewelry, or any other small things you want to keep safe. It's much nicer looking than in the pictures. And looks better built than the pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: della b

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic look and storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was so glad I ordered it- I’ve been waiting for the perfect one to come along and this is it! A ton of storage and looks quite nice on my dresser. I’d say it’s too big for traveling- but if you’re moving or something it would be excellent to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: targaholic

customer_reviews.title: The Kendal Leather Jewelry Box is very nice. I have a lot of space for all ...
customer_reviews.text: The Kendal Leather Jewelry Box is very nice. I have a lot of space for all my jewelry. The fact that there are small spaces to keep the different pieces separate is great. It is also very attractive. Frances Becker
customer_reviews.author: Frances Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision for my Jewelry Needs
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy and I love it. I'm a huge jewelry person and needed more room. The Kendal Huge Jewelry Box is perfect. Even the color and feel is impressive. There is more than enough room for earrings, bracelets and necklaces. I even have room in the bottom drawer for pens and buttons I wear. You won't be disappointed. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice Jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. In fact she picked it out. A nice jewelry box with many different compartments. Nicely made to hold many items.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spinner

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and allows for the storage of a great amount of jewelry. I like the fact that it has different types of compartment, which makes it versatile. It is also very well made and sturdy. I will use it for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: SheShops247

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is great! I was looking for something big enough to fit my entire collection and something that would keep a lot of earrings and necklaces separated. This works perfectly! I love all the compartments. The side necklace sections are especially great. And, it looks great on my dresser!
customer_reviews.author: Tucky

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My young wife passed away 2 months ago. In trying to clean up and get organized some, I decided I needed a jewelry box for all her jewelry, which was basically lying aimlessly in a dresser drawer. This was the perfect size and design, and it fit everything. Now I just need to find a spot in the house to keep it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks extremely nice.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised. My wife is extremely satisfied with it. It holds all of her jewelry perfectly and looks beautiful doing it. She couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: petenkathy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Plus there's a years warranty on it. Only one thing there's no lock or strap to keep the front draws from sliding open. It needs a strap. Otherwise, it's perfect and we'll made. It's heavy. I love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jewelry box. It is large enough to hold all of my special items I have been receiving from my Mom. I had looked at many department stores but found nothing as nice and reasonably priced as this box. I am very pleased with the functionality and quality. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Simms

customer_reviews.title: Daughter’s birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter on September 1. She was thrilled when she saw it, and I was also since I had not opened the package when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Lennygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It looks good (brown), is sturdy and it holds a lot! I was worried my jewelry wouldn't fit, but it did with some room left over.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda R. Pyke

customer_reviews.title: Love it BUT desperately needs a strap that will go ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my traveling. Love it BUT desperately needs a strap that will go across the drawer fronts too keep them from opening when on the road. I had to buy a flat bungee cord. Disappointed how it looks but my only option.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Swan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best all-in-one
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box accommodates all types of jewelry and their various sizes. From the sectioned drawers to the deep drawer, you really have enough space to fit earrings, necklaces, bracelets, rings and watches. The side "drawers" are a plus providing extra storage to hang necklaces or larger earrings. Very well thought-out!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Craftmanship is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Spacious compartments are provided for any type of jewelry. The jewelry box was packed carefully to ensure no damage during shipment. I would highly recommend this jewelry box to anyone shopping for one.
customer_reviews.author: Mcastl

customer_reviews.title: Great counter jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 9 yr and she loves it. It will be one she can grow into as she begins to switch out costume jewelry to nicer items. She is wearing more of her nicer jewelry because it is so organized. Great price, great item, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Hart

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I excepted. It hold lots of Jewelry. I find it very organized and easy to find my stuff. The clasps and drawers are easy to use. This product also is very stylish. The only thing that I don’t like is it the drawers can come out really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This jewelry box is a jewel
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jewelry box!! It is a great size for all my necklaces and has plenty of necklace holders but they do seem a little bit flimsy just have to be careful. There are plenty of drawers and everything. You can take out the dividers in the drawers if you just want one big drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally blown away by this jewelry box. It was definitely worth the money and more. I wanted to find something for my daughter to put her jewelry in and this worked out great. It holds a lot of various jewelry items and my daughter just loved it. It was well made and study and well packed when received. I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: A great jewelry box for organization!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jewelry box for my husband, because he loves things that keep him organized. He likes this item very much, and has stored his jewelry, watches, wallet and phone in it, as it has many storage compartments. This is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom. It’s just as pictured and I know she’s going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Many drawers with sections, lots of hangers for your necklaces and very spacious. I thought all of my jewelry wouldn’t fit but I actually have space to fill!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jewelry box!! I am able to get everything I had in my old jewelry box plus the extra stuff I had in baggies and other little boxes into it. It’s awesome!! Everything is organized and visible. Nothing is knotted up/hard to find. Makes my life so much easier/better! And it’s really great looking! It’s a nice and decorative addition to my bedroom.😃🙌🏻👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: My gf loved it and I did too she had a lot of jewelry and she was able to get all of it in.
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made jewelry box. Plenty of room for all manner of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Delight!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my grand daughter. She has a lot of jewelry all over her dresser. This should be large enough for all of them. It is the only one I could find that would be suitable for a young girl.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, but wish it had extra dividers but removable as well as earring post/hook holders. However, still a nice Christmas gift for a relative 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Joel4u

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved the jewelry box for her birthday. It is well made and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred F.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box arrived today and it is very nice. It will hold a lot of Jewelry and makes efficient use of space. It’s a Christmas gift for my Mom and I think she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked it so much that I am going to buy one for her too. The carry handle is very useful because I can lock it and move it to another location.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sen

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Lots of storagelots of compartments and still compact
customer_reviews.author: Nancy woeste

customer_reviews.title: This is like a Pandora box
customer_reviews.text: This is like a Pandora box. Very good quarlity and size. It made me feel great when feeding it with adorable stuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: What a practical jewelry organizer. Everything you can ask for......all in one. More than what I expected. Great quality...impressive Holds tons of jewelry. Absolutely luv luv it !!!!! You will never again look for another jewelry box. This is a must have. You won’t regret it. Shipping was extremely fast ....3 days. Ladies I have had many jewelry boxes but this one tops them all.
customer_reviews.author: Trishachand

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry box is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 89 year old mother; it was a Christmas gift to her from my brother. The packaging was great, the jewelry box was well protected. She opened it Christmas afternoon at our family gathering and was tickled. Her one request - now we need to buy more jewelry for her to fill it up!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rissy

product_meta.title: Kendal Huge Leather Jewelry Box/Case/Storage LJC-SHD5BK (Black)
feature_bullets: Clean lined, sleek, contemporary designed jewelry box. Sturdy construction. It measures 12.00"L x 6.70"W x 12.75"H when closed.
Comes in a black PU leather finish. Exquisitely hand-lined in suede fabric.
Top lid has a large beveled glass mirror nestled inside. The removable top section has 2 compartments, each size is 7.25”L x 2.625”W x 1.125” H, and one compartment has 3 suede lined ring slots.

5 removable drawers for maximum jewelry storage. The deeper bottom drawer has only one compartment. Its size is 7.31"L x 5.81"W x 2.25"H. The other 4 drawers have the equal size. Their size is 7.31"L x 5.81"W x 1.00"H. Drawer 1 has 20 equal size compartments; Drawer 2 has 12 equal size compartments; Drawer 3 has 4 equal size compartments; Drawer 4 has just one compartment.
2 swing out cabinets, each with 8 necklace hooks and 2 storage ledges. Weight: 8 lbs 10 oz.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,291 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
